title: Live Nation Entertainment 's artist management revenue from 2008 to 2016
summary: Founded in Sweden 2003 , Live Nation Entertainment is a video game developer that is most famous for its blockbuster gaming hit , Candy Crush Saga .
The developer 's Revenue reached 421.71 million U.S. dollars in 2016 , a marked increase from Revenue of less than 60 million U.S. dollars in 2008 .
Live Nation Entertainment of the developers In its early years in the social gaming world , Live Nation Entertainment relied on in-game advertising and micro-transactions to generate Revenue .
gold: This statistic presents the revenue Live Nation generated with artist management business ( Artist Nation ) from 2008 to 2016 . In 2014 , the U.S. live event specialist generated a total revenue of 389.44 million US dollars managing its signed artists , up from 352.95 million a year earlier .
